This is a document practicing uploading changes from RMarkdown to Github. Please enjoy the animation below.

```{r echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(gganimate)
library(transformr)
library(tidyverse)

# Create a data set
df <- data.frame(
  x = seq(0, 2 * pi, length.out = 100)
) %>%
  mutate(y = sin(x), frame = x)

# Plot and animate
p <- ggplot(df, aes(x, y)) +
  geom_line(color = "gray80") +
  geom_point(color = "red", size = 4) +
  labs(title = "Sine Wave Animation", x = "x", y = "sin(x)") +
  transition_reveal(x)  # Animate over x values

# Render animation
animate(p, duration = 4, fps = 20, width = 600, height = 400, renderer = gifski_renderer())
```
